tasks.title: Define Creative Chaos motion tokens
tasks.description:
Create standardized animation/motion tokens for consistent timing, easing, and motion patterns.

**What to do:**
- Create `lib/motion-tokens.ts` with exported constants
- Define: `durations` (fast: 150ms, normal: 300ms, slow: 600ms, dramatic: 1200ms)
- Define: `easings` (organic, bounce, smooth, dramatic) as cubic-bezier values
- Define: `intensities` (subtle: 0.3, normal: 1, bold: 1.5, chaotic: 2)
- Define: `scales` (breathe, pulse, float amplitude values)
- Make compatible with Framer Motion and CSS animations
- Add JSDoc documentation

**Files:**
- lib/motion-tokens.ts (create)

**Acceptance criteria:**
- All token categories defined with JSDoc
- Tokens exportable for Framer Motion
- pnpm build passes
